dmca.title: Stolen Sites Hosting on your Servers
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: TJ Visicaro [mailto:tjjr615@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, July 05, 2005 10:14 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; support@theplanet.com;
legal-response@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: Stolen Sites Hosting on your Servers


I have sent you letters in the past about your Client Matt Anderson. Well
now he has taken it way to far, Since I have sent you a Letter in the past,
Letteing you know about him, And "The Planet" not taking action ageanst him.
I hold you resposable for his lates action. Stealing my Website content and
my SQL Database and placing it on server he rents from you. Copys All my
Graphics.. What is up with that? you Host Hackers sites? 
 
the site I am talking about is
 
UGLClan.com Owned by TJ Visicaro
My Site
 
Site Stolen to 
uglclan.net. 
 
Matt Anderson. 
 
He has Broken all your Copyright Rules. This is my Last letter, the next one
will be from the Layers. 
 
I expect this site Locked down. the database locked. If you can not comply
with this let me know do I can see other means to stop him.
 
Thank you 
TJ Visicaro

__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around 
http://mail.yahoo.com
